summary: This bill, the EO 14253 Act of 2025, introduced in the House of Representatives, aims to codify Executive Order 14253. The Executive Order's stated purpose is "restoring truth and sanity to American history." The bill, introduced by Mr. Burchett, was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources and the Committee on House Administration. The bill's key provision gives Executive Order 14253 the force and effect of law.
